mapper.insert: insert into USERS (num, userid, f_name,l_name, f_e_name, l_e_name, password, email, phone, address, rdate) values (seq_users.nextval, #{userid}, #{f_name}, #{l_name}, #{f_e_name}, #{l_e_name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from users where 'USER' in (select au.auth from users u left outer join users_auth au on u.userid=au.userid)
select nvl(idchk(#{id}),0) as bool from dual
